org.fit.cssbox.layout
Class ListItemBox

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.layout.Box
      org.fit.cssbox.layout.ElementBox
          org.fit.cssbox.layout.BlockBox
              org.fit.cssbox.layout.ListItemBox

public class ListItemBox
extends BlockBox

This class represents a list-item box. This box behaves the same way as a block box with some modifications.

Author:
radek
